name: preact-multi-provider
description: Provide multiple contexts at once instead of using hundreds of context providers
author: Marvin Hagemeister <hello@marvinh.dev>

scripts.build2: esbuild src/index.tsx --outfile=dist/esm/index.mjs --sourcemap=inline && esbuild src/index.tsx --platform=node --outfile=dist/cjs/index.js --format=cjs --sourcemap=inline && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json
